pluginDescription.zh: 根据提示词从头开始生成歌词或续写已有歌词
pluginDescription.en: Generate lyrics from scratch or continue existing lyrics from prompts

content.zh: 该插件不支持或认可用户生成的任何内容。用户对他们使用该插件生成和传播的内容负有全部责任。TuneFlow的创建者对因使用插件而导致的任何直接或间接的损害均不承担任何责任，对插件生成的任何内容或因此类内容而导致的任何损害不负有责任。用户同意不将插件用于任何非法目的，包括但不限于创建、推广或传播任何非法、诽谤、冒犯或有害的内容。
content.en: The plugin does not support or endorse any content generated by users. Users are solely responsible for the content they generate and disseminate using the plugin. The creators of the TuneFlow disclaim all liability for any damage, direct or indirect, resulting from the use of the plugin. The creators are not responsible for any content generated by the plugin or for any damage resulting from such content. Users agree to not use the plugin for any unlawful purposes, including but not limited to creating, promoting, or disseminating any unlawful, defamatory, offensive, or harmful content.

pluginDescription.en: Rewrite an existing lyrics paragraph from prompts

pluginDescription.en: Rewrite an existing lyrics line from prompts
